alert.note: Alert for Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon; Lower Columbia Basin of Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 07 at 6:13PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Umatilla County through 645 PM PDT... At 613 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout 7 miles west of Rieth, or 10 miles west of Pendleton, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Landspout possible, winds in excess of 30 mph, and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pendleton and Rieth. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon; Lower Columbia Basin of Oregon
